data.title: Car Rental at Zagreb Downtown
data.meta_description: Car Rental at Zagreb Downtown â¤ Find SIXT's fleet of like-new vehicles at convenient pick-up & drop-off locations â Choose from a range of SUVs, convertibles, luxury cars & passenger vans
data.text:
Sixt Car Rental Zagreb Hotel Panorama welcomes visitors to its scenic downtown branch where you can obtain economical rent a car to facilitate driving in Croatia's largest city. For diverse transportation requirements, our professional staff provides customers with affordable and premium vehicles in a quality luxury or sports model. Whether it's a business or vacation option, our accessible and centric Zagreb Hotel Panorama agency provides other selections of rental car categories, including SUV, convertible and van options. To complete your rental transaction, we also assist you with other deals such as LWD insurance and other additional drivers. Sixt Zagreb Hotel Panorama endeavors to make your driving experience memorable in the historic and vibrant Zagreb hub.

Once you have secured your vehicle from our Zagreb Hotel Panorama facility, you can experience the unique sites and delightful attractions that the city offers visitors with our car rental. Enjoy a relaxing drive through the Upper Town portion of the city to appreciate the classical Eastern European architecture of its impressive churches and buildings. Travel to the beautiful Jarun Lake, which located in the southwestern portion of Zagreb. The leisure park allows you to participate in many outdoor activities such as jogging, rowing or swimming. Drive your rent a car to the village of Scitarjevo and visit Andautonia Archaeological Park, which is the site of an ancient Roman town. Tourists can explore its ruins and marvel at the baths and city streets still being excavated. Discover and travel through the metropolis in style with a Sixt rented car.
